title: Summarize REFLORA collections
text: Install latest development version refloraR GitHub: following code can used extract summary REFLORA-associated collections, including herbarium acronym, curator’s email contact, number records direct link original REFLORA Integrated Publishing Toolkit (IPT). specifying vector herbarium acronyms, user can extract summary just specific herbarium collection.
code: #install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("DBOSlab/refloraR") library(refloraR) summary_df <- reflora_summary(verbose = TRUE,                               save = TRUE,                               dir = "reflora_summary") summary_some_df <- reflora_summary(herbarium = c("ALCB", "RB", "HUEFS", "US", "K"),                                    verbose = TRUE,                                    save = TRUE,                                    dir = "reflora_summary")

REFLORA Virtual Herbarium platform developed partnership Rio de Janeiro Botanical Garden (JBRJ) COPPE (Alberto Luiz Coimbra Institute Graduate Studies Research Engineering, UFRJ).
